title: Typofonderie.com Font Discoveries May 2009
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020125841im_/http:/typophile.com/files/4fonts_may2009_3771.png)

Every two months, we offer a font discovery pack at a very affordable price compared to regular prices when purchased with the rest of a family. From €98. You save approximately 30%.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020125841im_/http:/typophile.com/files/4fonts_a_may2009_4192.png)

The first Font Discoveries pack is a good way to discover our fonts at an affordable price. Jump on the [Font Discoveries May 2009](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020125841/http:/www.typofonderie.com/alphabets/special_offers/fontdiscoveriesmay2009) for more info about the 4 fonts included: Parisine Plus Sombre PTF Bold Italic, Angie Sans Std Regular, Le Monde Livre Classic Std Swashes, Apolline Std Demi. In July, a new pack will remplace it, so don’t miss this opportunity.

[Font Discoveries page](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020125841/http:/www.typofonderie.com/alphabets/special_offers/fontdiscoveries)  
 [Font Discoveries May 2009](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020125841/http:/www.typofonderie.com/alphabets/special_offers/fontdiscoveriesmay2009)
